Hero.description: Delivering responsive, scalable, and user-friendly web applications by combining professional frontend experience with Full Stack skills. Passionate about clean code, accessible design, and seamless user experiences.

About.title: ABOUT ME
About.subtitle: Full Stack Engineer
About.description: I'm Mupa Nzaphila, a Full Stack Engineer with professional frontend experience and comprehensive Full Stack training. I build responsive, scalable, and user-friendly web applications using React, Next.js, Node.js, and modern backend technologies, turning complex problems into intuitive solutions. I'm passionate about clean code, thoughtful design, and creating products that not only work — but delight users.

achievements: Designing and building Full Stack applications using React, Next.js, Vue.js, Node.js, and MongoDB
Developing portfolio projects such as E-commerce Product Tracker and Election Monitoring System
Expanding backend expertise with API integrations, authentication, and database management
Continuously refining frontend skills with a focus on performance, accessibility, and UX
Optimized dashboards for large-scale datasets, improving performance and usability
Built data visualizations supporting 20+ corporate clients in making data-driven decisions
Integrated backend APIs into the frontend, reducing response times and enhancing UX
Developed finance calculators and checkout tools used by 100,000+ monthly users
Implemented responsive design, boosting mobile engagement and cross-device functionality
Collaborated with backend teams to integrate APIs and optimize data processing

google.description: Comprehensive UX design program covering user research, wireframing, prototyping, and usability testing. Gained expertise in design thinking, accessibility, and creating user-centered digital experiences.

microverse.description: Intensive Full Stack development program focusing on modern web technologies, pair programming, and remote collaboration. Mastered React, Ruby on Rails, PostgreSQL, and agile development methodologies.

Contact.name: Your Name
Contact.description: I'm always open to discussing new projects or opportunities - feel free to get in touch!
